parameters.name: profile
parameters.label: Configuration profile(s)
parameters.usage: Configuration profile to use. Can use multiple (comma separated).

parameters.name: samplePlan
parameters.label: Input files
parameters.usage: Path to sample plan (csv format) with raw reads (if `--reads` is not specified), or intermediate files according to the `--step` parameter

parameters.name: design
parameters.label: Input files
parameters.usage: Path to design file specifying the metadata associated with the samples

parameters.name: step
parameters.label: Starting step
parameters.usage: Specify starting step

parameters.name: genome
parameters.label: Reference genome
parameters.usage: Name of the reference genome.

parameters.name: genomeAnnotationPath
parameters.label: PATH to Reference
parameters.usage: PATH to the reference genome folder.

parameters.name: tools
parameters.label: Variant calling tools
parameters.usage: Specify tools to use for variant calling

parameters.name: outDir
parameters.label: Output directory
parameters.usage: The output directory where the results will be saved

parameters.name: reads
parameters.label: Input files
parameters.usage: Path to input data (must be surrounded with quotes)

parameters.name: singleEnd
parameters.label: singleEnd
parameters.usage: For single-end input data

parameters.name: saveAlignedIntermediates
parameters.label: Save aligned intermediates
parameters.usage: Save intermediates alignment files

parameters.name: mapQual
parameters.label: Min map qual
parameters.usage: Minimum mapping quality to consider for an alignment

parameters.name: aligner
parameters.label: Alignement tool
parameters.usage: Specify tools to use for mapping

parameters.name: targetBed
parameters.label: Target Bed file
parameters.usage: Target Bed file for targeted or whole exome sequencing

parameters.name: keepDups
parameters.label: keep Duplicate reads
parameters.usage: Specify to keep duplicate reads when filtering the alignment

parameters.name: keepSingleton
parameters.label: keep Singleton reads
parameters.usage: Specify to keep singleton reads when filtering the alignment

parameters.name: keepMultiHits
parameters.label: keep Multi hit reads
parameters.usage: Specify to keep multi hit reads when filtering the alignment

parameters.name: baseQual
parameters.label: Base quality
parameters.usage: Minimum base quality used by Facets for CNV calling

parameters.name: orientationBiais
parameters.label: orientation Biais filter
parameters.usage: Specify to use the orientation Biais filter for Mutect2 calls (for FFPE samples)

parameters.name: saveVcfMetrics
parameters.label: Save vcf metrics
parameters.usage: Save complementary vcf metrics files

parameters.name: saveVcfIntermediates
parameters.label: Save intermediate vcf files
parameters.usage: Save intermediate vcf files

parameters.name: ffpe
parameters.label: ffpe for TMB
parameters.usage: Specify to use the ffpe parameters and filters for TMB computation

parameters.name: annotDb
parameters.label: Annotation databases
parameters.usage: Annotation databases to use with SnpEff and SnpSift

parameters.name: skipPreseq
parameters.label: Skip Preseq
parameters.usage: Disable Preseq

parameters.name: skipFastqc
parameters.label: Skip Fastqc
parameters.usage: Disable Fastqc

parameters.name: skipBQSR
parameters.label: Skip BQSR
parameters.usage: Disable BQSR

parameters.name: skipIdentito
parameters.label: Skip Identito
parameters.usage: Disable Identito

parameters.name: skipMultiqc
parameters.label: Skip MultiQC
parameters.usage: Disable MultiQC

parameters.name: skipQC
parameters.label: Skip all QCs
parameters.usage: Disable all QCs

parameters.name: nucleotidesPerSecond
parameters.label: Nucleotides per second
parameters.usage: To estimate interval size

parameters.name: sequencingCenter
parameters.label: Sequencing center name
parameters.usage: Name of sequencing center to be displayed in BAM file

parameters.name: multiqcConfig
parameters.label: MultiQC configuration File
parameters.usage: Specify a custom config file for MultiQC

parameters.name: name
parameters.label: Name for the pipeline run
parameters.usage: Name for the pipeline run. If not specified, Nextflow will automatically generate a random mnemonic
